Class Text

java.lang.Object
  Text

public class Text
extends Object

A class to hold a piece of text to be displayed on the canvas.

Version:
November 2011
Author:
Dr A J Beaumont

Constructor Detail

Text

public Text(String text)
Constructor for objects of class Text.

Parameters:
text - a bit of text.
Method Detail

changeColor

public void changeColor(String newColor)
Change the color. Valid colors are "red", "yellow", "blue", "green", "magenta", "pink", "orange", "cyan" and "black".

Parameters:
newColor - the name of the new colour.

changeFont

public void changeFont(String newFontName)
Change the font. Valid font names can be found by calling printFonts().

Parameters:
newFontName - the name of the new font family.

changeSize

public void changeSize(int newSize)
Change the font size of the text to a given value. The value of newSize must be >= 0.

Parameters:
newSize - the new font size of the text.

getFontName

public String getFontName()
The name of the current font.

getFontSize

public int getFontSize()
Returns:
the size of the font.

getText

public String getText()
Returns:
the text itself.

getTextHeight

public int getTextHeight()
Find the height of the text in the selected font.

Returns:
the height of the text

getTextWidth

public int getTextWidth()
Find the width of the text in the selected font.

Returns:
the width of the text

getXPosition

public int getXPosition()
Returns:
The X coordinate of the left of the text on the canvas.

getYPosition

public int getYPosition()
Returns:
The Y coordinate of the left of the text on the canvas.

makeInvisible

public void makeInvisible()
Erase the graphical representation of the text on the canvas. If it was already invisible, do nothing.

makeVisible

public void makeVisible()
Draw a graphical representation of the text on the canvas. If it was already visible, do nothing.

moveDown

public void moveDown()
Reposition the text vertically by a measure of 20.

moveHorizontal

public void moveHorizontal(int distance)
Reposition the text horizontally across the canvas by a given amount.

Parameters:
distance - The amount by which to move the text.

moveLeft

public void moveLeft()
Reposition the text horizontally across the canvas by a measure of -20.

moveRight

public void moveRight()
Reposition the text horizontally across the canvas by a measure of 20.

moveUp

public void moveUp()
Reposition the text vertically by a measure of -20.

moveVertical

public void moveVertical(int distance)
Reposition the text vertically across the canvas by a given amount.

Parameters:
distance - The amount by which to move the text.

positionOnCanvas

public void positionOnCanvas(int x,
                             int y)

printFonts

public void printFonts()
Print the names of all the available fonts.

randomizePosition

public void randomizePosition()
Reposition the text at a new, random position on the canvas.

setPosition

public void setPosition(int xPos,
                        int yPos)
Set the left edge of the text using the coordinates of the supplied point.

Parameters:
xPos - the new X coordinate of the left edge of the text
yPos - the new Y coordinate of the left edge of the text

slowMoveHorizontal

public void slowMoveHorizontal(int distance)
Slowly move the text horizontally across the canvas by a given amount. The movement across the canvas will be visible.

Parameters:
distance - The amount by which to move the text.

slowMoveVertical

public void slowMoveVertical(int distance)
Slowly move the text vertically across the canvas by a given amount. The movement across the canvas will be visible.

Parameters:
distance - The amount by which to move the text.
